article_title: Tuesday letters: ACA, foster care, restroom access, UH speaker
article_text: To continue reading this story, you will need to be a digital subscriber to HoustonChronicle.com.

article_metadata.description: Regarding "The Face of ACA" (Page A16, Friday), while it is correct that the Affordable Care Act (ACA) provides insurance coverage for individuals regardless of pre-existing conditions, the insurance policies offered in the Texas marketplace provide a narrow network of providers, hospitals and drugs.  Even with insurance, I doubt if Mark's specialty, high-priced drug would have been included in any network insurance plan.  Regarding 'Your home is exemplary' (Page B1, Sunday), the survival of these two children with troubled, horrific family histories, IS a matter of "life and death" - emotional and mental, as well as physical and social well-being.  What are our government officials - state and local - going to do about this injustice to and with our fellow citizens and human beings?  Bring them back where they are already accepted and loved, and have hope for happiness, normal healthy human living and a future to believe in!
